verses.verse: In Judah <S%H3063><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> known <S%H3045><s%>: his name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
In Salem <S%H8004><s%> also is his tabernacle <S%H5520><s%>, and his living place <S%H4585><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
There broke <S%H7665><s%> he the arrows <S%H7565><s%> of the bow <S%H7198><s%>, the shield <S%H4043><s%>, and the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and the battle <S%H4421><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
You are more glorious <S%H215><s%> and excellent <S%H117><s%> than the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of prey <S%H2964><s%>.

The stouthearted <S%H47><s%> are spoiled <S%H7997><s%>, they have slept <S%H5123><s%> their sleep <S%H8142><s%>: and none of the men <S%H582><s%> of might <S%H2428><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%>.
At your rebuke <S%H1606><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, both the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and horse <S%H5483><s%> are cast into a dead sleep <S%H7290><s%>.
You <S%H3372><s%>, even you, are to be feared: and who may stand <S%H5975><s%> in your sight <S%H6440><s%> when <S%H227><s%> once you are angry <S%H639><s%>?
You did cause judgment <S%H1779><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>; the earth <S%H776><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%>, and was still <S%H8252><s%>,
When God <S%H430><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> to judgment <S%H4941><s%>, to save <S%H3467><s%> all the meek <S%H6035><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Surely the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H7611><s%>: the remainder of wrath <S%H2534><s%> shall you restrain <S%H2296><s%>.

Vow <S%H5087><s%>, and pay <S%H7999><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>: let all that be round about <S%H5439><s%> him bring <S%H2986><s%> presents <S%H7862><s%> unto him that should be feared <S%H4172><s%>.
He shall cut off <S%H1219><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of princes <S%H5057><s%>: he is terrible <S%H3372><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
